<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Amulet of the Third Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2132)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn amulet

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large brass medallion hangs low on the torso. It’s shaped in the form of an unblinking eye, with a ring of turquoise as the iris and an orb of jet serving as the pupil. The amulet grants you a +2 item bonus to [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=2298) checks. When you invest the amulet, you either increase your Wisdom modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Amulet of the Third Eye
